title: Casper the Friendly Ghost - The Deep Boo Sea

sources.title: The Deep Boo Sea (1952)
sources.description: Little Billy wants to play pirates with two older friends. However, the big kids won't let him play. He meets up with Casper, and the two build a raft together and sail out to to sea to search for pirate treasure... and find it. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-deep-boo-sea-1952/

metadata.Plot: Casper plays pirates with a young boy and rescues his brothers from a whale.
metadata.Actors: Jackson Beck, Jack Mercer, Mae Questel
